bb.desc: 24 combo powerful Light attack on all foes, boosts max HP, considerably boosts BC and HC drop rates for 3 turns, considerably boosts BB gauge when damaged for 3 turns, Spark damage boosts BB gauge for 3 turns & negates critical damage for 2 turns
bb.name: Propertiere

dictionary.description: There are many enduring mysteries regarding the deity Lucius, and some scholars believe that the Lucius we knew was not the deity's true form. Their theories hold that Lucius kept this form a tightly-held secret, and that the deity refrained from using this power for that reason. If the scholars are correct, then there may have been a much different outcome for Grand Gaia had Lucius revealed this power in full against the Holy Emperor, or a certain Summoner's party.
dictionary.fusion: So you intend to use that loathsome power on me... Yet your control is not absolute. Remember that well, human...
dictionary.summon: You have transcended humanity, demons, and in the end, even the gods... What do you seek? What will you become?

extra skill.desc: Negates critical and elemental damage & adds huge BB gauge boost effect to BB/SBB
extra skill.name: True Form Revealed

skill.name: Adds Spark damage reduction effect to BB/SBB

leader skill.desc: 60% boosts to all parameters, enormously boosts BB gauge each turn, slight damage reduction for 2 turns when damage taken exceeds certain amount & enormously boosts Spark damage for 2 turns when Spark damage exceeds certain amount
leader skill.name: Sealed Divinity

sbb.desc: 40 combo massive Light attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP), hugely boosts Atk, Def, Rec relative to max HP for 3 turns, hugely boosts BC efficacy for 3 turns, adds all elements to attack for 3 turns & negates elemental damage for 2 turns
sbb.name: Unveiled Metanoia

ubb.desc: 80 combo massive Light attack on all foes (uses all allies' BB gauge), fills all allies' BB gauge to max, hugely boosts max HP, activates Light barrier, adds all elements to attack for 3 turns & enormously boosts Spark damage for 3 turns
ubb.name: Native Gate
